Name: Maze: Pedestal of Trials
About the game: Maze: Pedestal of Trials is a sequel spin-off to the hit puzzle game, Maze. This entry into the TreeFall Studios Maze series brings all new challenges, new game-play abilities, new environments, and new puzzles. Taking place directly after the events of the first game, the 'Hero of Mazadon' embarks on a new journey to attempt the 'Pedestal of Trials'. -Includes 12 brand new levels. -New Checkpoint System -New Interactive Puzzles -New Environments To Explore Do you have what it takes to attempt the Pedestal of Trials?
